main.title: Hello, I am Chen, Yu-Cheng.
main.name: Chen, Yu-Cheng
main.bio:
My dream is to be a front-end engineer.
In my second year of college, I took a programming course, the teacher taught us the basic concept of programming and some techniques. In this course, I realized programming is powerful, also, it makes our lives more convenient. So I applied what I had learned to make a visual novel in another class, which was built with Processing and JavaScript, and this project was well-received by external assessors, and our team won second place.
The experience above inspired me to be an engineer, so I started to learn front-end development, I was not only learned it from school, but also from books and technical documents on the Internet. To make use of what I had learned, I applied for an internship in my third summer vacation, learning how to use React.js and developing a data service system with backend engineers. In my senior year, I was an intern in another company, helping them maintain the e-commerce platform, besides, I built a map for the Singaporeans to pick up with Vue.js. Besides, I took courses such as data structure and algorithm to improve my ability.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: In my third year of college, I applied for double majors. In this department, I understood how to make a Bluetooth boat by Arduino, video games built with JavaScript, etc.
I learned the appreciation and exploration of traditional Chinese literature in college.

skills.description: Knowing the template syntax and its APIs, I also have studied its design principle before.

skills.description: I can compose necessary loaders to build a React.js project.

skills.description: Can unit testing a React project with Jest and Enzyme, and counting its coverage.

skills.description: Having the ability to create API for front-end interface to get data, and I use PDO to connect a database.

skills.description: Knowing how to make adjustments to photos, designing simple illustrations and making animations to enrich webpages.

employment.title: Coretronic Intelligent Robotics Corporation
employment.description:
編寫無人機操作的網站介面，提供客戶、無人機飛手設定無人機自動飛行的路線。
使用 Vue.js 和 Google Map，熟悉如何將兩者相互搭配與應用，如：Route Survey，藉由 API 取得歷史飛行紀錄（電池剩餘電量等），由高至低會將圖標渲染成綠色到紅色，並依序繪製在地圖上。
使用 ApexCharts 製作圖表，如：MRP（Mountain Route Planning），將使用者設定的飛行路徑帶入圖表，並透過 Google Elevation API 取得沿路的山脈海拔高再繪於圖表上，透過圖表檢視飛行路線是否會撞山，使用者能一目了然。
使用 Webpack 做前端模組管理，搭配使用 Airbnb 風格的 ESLint。CSS 的設計模式為 BEM。與後端串接的 API 風格為 Restful。另有使用 Git 做版控。

work.title: ACCESS Co., Ltd
work.description:
Selling and maintaining the products on the e-commerce platform, the owners include Perfect One, Calpis and JIMOS.
Helping create the webpage of the automated tool with Vue.js and Vuetify, which is for STAR TO ASIA company.
Building the map with Vue and OpenStreetMap, for the Singaporean search where can they take the goods.
Build an automated tool with Vue.js and Puppeteer, for the company members to cancel bad orders.
Unit testing the company's latest shopping system with Jest and Vue Test Utils.

work.title: Xnet Inc
work.description:
Helping front-end engineer to build Xnet Analytics system for the company to get funding from the SBIR program.
Making webpages for advertising and selling the new book of the company.
I took a meeting minutes of a meeting.
During the internship, I used React, React Router, jQuery and ECharts, etc.

activity.title: Web Development course
activity.description:
Helping the teacher to schedule the course.
Helping the teacher to invigilate in the final exam.
Commenting and scoring in the final report.

activity.title: Participating in the USR Project

Doing some preparation such as connecting with teachers at MingDao elementary school and checking for devices.
Helping the teacher to teach APP Inventor in class.

portfolio.title: Paint
portfolio.detail: The online paint tool was built with Canvas API.

main.title: 您好，我是陳昱丞
main.name: 陳昱丞
main.bio:
我是一名 Junior 前端工程師，有大約 4 個月的工作經驗，外加實習 8 個月。開發上使用過 Vue.js、React.js、jQuery，目前主要使用 Vue.js。
我從大學二年級接觸程式語言，並修習第二主修——數位內容學程——修習程式設計和網頁設計的相關課程，私下也會研讀書籍和蒐集網路資料來充實自己。為了應用所學並結合實務，我在大三暑假開始實習，使用 React.js 與後端工程師開發數據服務系統。大四學期間，在另一間公司協助電商平台的維護，以及用 Vue.js 製作新加坡取貨地圖。
等待兵役的期間，我開始投遞履歷，最終進入中光電智能機器人擔任前端工程師。工作中我使用 Vue.js，外加 ApexCharts 和 Google Map 等套件。開發上與後端工程師、UI 設計師同仁討論、相互合作，協力打造無人機操作系統。
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: 數位內容與科技學士學位學程
education.description: 大三時我申請此學程。課程中除了教導對科技和藝術相關的知識，還有許多專案，故我學會用 Maya 建模、使用 After Affect 做動畫、 Arduino 做藍芽遙控船，以及用 JavaScript 做網頁遊戲。
在大學中我學習文學鑑賞和如何對古文進行章句、聲韻和詞彙的研究。

employment.title: 中強光電智能機器人
employment.description:
編寫無人機操作的網站介面，提供客戶、無人機飛手設定無人機自動飛行的路線。
依照 UI 設計師的設計稿製作網頁，與後端工程師討論如何開設 API，彼此緊密合作來開發每項功能。
使用 Vue.js 和 Google Map，熟悉如何將兩者相互搭配與應用，實作功能如：Route Survey，藉由 API 取得歷史飛行紀錄（電池剩餘電量等），由高至低會將圖標渲染成綠色到紅色，並依序繪製在地圖上。
使用 ApexCharts 製作圖表，如：MRP（Mountain Route Planning），將使用者設定的飛行路徑帶入圖表，並透過 Google Elevation API 取得沿路的山脈海拔高再繪於圖表上，透過圖表檢視飛行路線是否會撞山。
使用 Webpack 做前端模組管理，搭配使用 Airbnb 風格的 ESLint。CSS 的設計模式為 BEM。與後端串接的 API 風格為 Restful。另有使用 Git 做版控。

work.title: 日商 愛可信（ACCESS）
work.description:
協助電商平台的購物車商品上架與後續維護，業主涵蓋新日本製藥、可爾必思、JIMOS 等。
使用 Vue 和 Vuetify 協助刻製自動化工具的頁面，以供亞星通（Star to Asia）公司使用。
使用 Vue 和 OpenStreetMap 製作地圖，供新加坡的客戶查詢取貨地點。
使用 Node.js 的 Puppeteer 自動化操作 CROS 系統取消訂單。
使用 Jest 和 Vue Test Utils 對購物車進行單元測試。

work.title: 智媒科技股份有限公司
work.description:
協助打造「智媒數據顧問服務」系統以取得 SBIR 計劃的資金。
為公司的新書「我的隊友是AI」撰寫宣傳頁面。
於公司會議時負責撰寫會議記錄。
實習期間使用 React、React Router、jQuery、ECharts 等框架和函式庫。

activity.title: 政大 Ｗeb程式設計 課程
activity.description:
協助教師進行課程規劃。
協助期末上機考的監考工作。
期末專案發表時進行講評和打分。

activity.title: 政大 USR 計劃
activity.description:
負責事前準備的工作，比如與國小方聯絡和課前設備檢查。
老師授課時管理秩序，以及練習時間協助學生操作 APP Inventor。
